entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
